me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bungeecord

Class ServerTransportManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bungeecord.ServerTransportManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PluginMessageListener

    public final class ServerTransportManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements PluginMessageListener
    This allows the sender to easily transport players between various servers on a BungeeCord network.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerTransportManager

        public ServerTransportManager(Plugin plugin)
        Internal constructor. Should not be called except by the GBukkitCore plugin instance. This type is registered as a service.
        Parameters:
        plugin - The GBukkitCore plugin instance.

    • Method Detail

      • sendPlayer

        public void sendPlayer(Player player,
              java.lang.String serverName)
        Send the specified player to the specified other server.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to send to another server.
        serverName - The name of the target server on the BungeeCord network.

      • getPlayers

        public void getPlayers(java.lang.String serverName,
              ResultReceived<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> resultHandler)
        Gets the array of players currently online on a server.
        Parameters:
        serverName - The name of the server.
        resultHandler - The function to invoke upon receiving the result. The source parameter is the server name, the result is the player list.
        See Also:
        ResultReceived

                           Player receiver,
